title: Champion & Chat stop working when game starts
body:
After 30-40 seconds into a game my champion stops moving and I can't let anyone know what's going on because chat doesn't work too. My FPS and ping are perfectly fine and everything else is running smoothly.
I have to disconnect and reconnect for it to work again and by the time I'm back in the game I'm already 4 levels down. 
Please help.
